name: Mini Games (Mcleen)
description:
Hi, I am a game dev student and recently I had to do a scripting assignment. The goal for the assignment was to remake 2 old school arcade retro games.

I chose to remake space invaders and Pong, while these remakes are very rough and I tried to not make them exact copies, I just thought I would upload it for the experience. I plan on making other small games throughout the rest of the year and in the future.
